Title: 'Stop EATING PLASTIC': 24 Hilarious Cat Memes Capturing the Meowgic of Cattitude

Title: 'Doom loops' are accelerating climate change—but we can break them
Description:
Vicious cycles are accelerating climate change.
One is happening at the north pole, where rising temperatures caused by record levels of fossil fuel combustion are melting more and more sea ice.
